synopsis.text:
School mayhem and athletic triumphs collide in the world of Kappei Sakamoto, an extraordinarily gifted sports prodigy with a peculiar weakness for white panties. Despite his diminutive stature, Kappei's unrivaled skills in various sports, especially basketball, make him a force to be reckoned with. As he navigates through the trials and tribulations of Seirin High School's basketball team, Kappei's determination and prowess help keep the team at the top of their game.

Off the court, Kappei's life is far from ordinary. Living under the same roof as the charming Akane Aki, he finds himself in a peculiar love triangle with her protective and cunning dog, Salomone. This crafty canine not only attempts to thwart Kappei's advances but also doubles as a commentator, elucidating the rules of the various sports Kappei excels in.

With an insatiable curiosity for white undergarments, Kappei's mischievous attempts to catch a glimpse often lead to hilarious and unexpected situations. As he juggles his amorous pursuits, sporting ambitions, and daily life, Kappei's adventures promise a thrilling and comedic rollercoaster ride that will leave you rooting for this unlikely hero.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
